name: Hypertension
desc: Chronic elevation of arterial pressure increasing cardiac load.

name: Type 2 Diabetes
desc: Insulin resistance causing prolonged glucose elevation.

name: Asthma
desc: Inflammatory airway disease causing episodic breathlessness.
prevention: Avoid triggers and monitor air quality.

name: COPD
desc: Progressive airflow limitation with chronic cough and dyspnea.

name: Anemia
desc: Low hemoglobin reducing oxygen delivery to tissues.

name: Dengue
desc: Mosquito-borne viral fever with myalgia and thrombocytopenia risk.

name: Thyroid Disorder
desc: Hormonal dysfunction affecting metabolism and energy levels.

name: Arthritis
desc: Joint inflammation causing pain and reduced mobility.

name: Stroke Risk
desc: Elevated probability of cerebrovascular ischemic or hemorrhagic events.
prevention: Control blood pressure, glucose, and lipids.

name: PCOS
desc: Endocrine disorder with menstrual and metabolic disturbances.

name: Obesity
desc: Excess adiposity increasing cardiometabolic burden.

name: CKD
desc: Gradual decline in renal filtration function.

name: Coronary Artery Disease
desc: Atherosclerotic narrowing of coronary circulation.

name: Fatty Liver Disease
desc: Hepatic fat accumulation linked to insulin resistance.
prevention: Reduce sugar intake and abdominal obesity.

name: Osteoporosis
desc: Reduced bone density with fracture susceptibility.

name: Sleep Apnea
desc: Repeated nocturnal airway obstruction with hypoxia.

name: GERD
desc: Acid reflux causing esophageal irritation and heartburn.
prevention: Avoid late meals and large portions.

name: Tuberculosis
desc: Infectious mycobacterial disease, often pulmonary.

name: Hepatitis B
desc: Viral liver infection with chronic disease potential.

name: Malaria
desc: Vector-borne parasitic infection with cyclical fever.

name: Hyperlipidemia
desc: Elevated blood lipids increasing vascular risk.
prevention: Limit trans fats and stay active.

name: IBS
desc: Functional bowel disorder with pain and altered stool patterns.

name: Migraine
desc: Neurovascular headache disorder with recurrent severe episodes.

name: Depression
desc: Persistent mood disorder with cognitive and physical impact.

name: Vitamin D Deficiency
desc: Low vitamin D affecting bone and immune regulation.
prevention: Sun exposure and supplementation when indicated.
